page.title: 04THE EAST KILBRIDE NEWS
page.content: "THE EAST KILBRIDE NEWS" This is the name of the local news paper.It was established in 1952 and enjoys a wide circulation,describing local events and successes,advertising and,of course,letters to the EDITOR. "East Kilbride Angling Club are very grateful to the "East Kilbride News" for bringing to the attention of the public the now serious pollution problem on the River Calder.So far this year there have been numerous cases,the most serious occurring only days after the river had been stocked with 3000 trout.There are two culprits -a firm who let tons of diesel fuel in to the watercourse and a company who discharged waste in the late evening to avoid detection.The Angling Club pay East Kilbride District Council a rent for the River Calder--is the Council ignoring POLLUTION PROBLEMS?"
